2) Wójcik M, Karpiak J, Zaręba L, Przybylski A. High in-hospital mortality 
and prevalence of cardiogenic shock in patients with ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction and concomitant COVID-19. Advances in Interventional Cardiology / Postępy w Kardiologii Interwencyjnej. 2023. doi:10.5114/aic.2023.124212.
3)  Wójcik M, Karpiak J, Zaręba L, Przybylski A. The GRACE risk score in patients with ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction and concomitant COVID-19. Arch Med Sci – Atheroscler Dis. 2022 Aug 10;7(1):116–23. 
4) Wójcik M, Wilczyńska A, Chlebuś M, Przybylski A. Electrotherapy 
and electrophysiology problems of COVID-19 infected patients in bi-disciplinary cardiological and cardiac surgery ward. W Dobrym Rytmie. 2022;4(61):14–8.
